mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MPRCS_TRAN_SERIAL_RECORD_INF ( REC_ID, BUS_TYPE, SUB_BUS, PAY_WAY, AGENT_ID, CUST_ID, CUST_NAME, TER_ID, BANK_CARD_NO, CARD_TYPE, TRAN_AMT, TRAN_YEAR, TRAN_MONTH, TRAN_DAY, TRAN_TIME, TRAN_CODE, TRAN_STATE, COOPORG_NO, M_ID, M_TYPE, MER_NO, TER_NO, MER_RATE_TYPE, MER_RATE, MER_RATE_TOP, TRAN_RATE_TYPE, TRAN_RATE, TRAN_RATE_TOP, THIRD_TRAN_DATE, THIRD_TRAN_TIME, MER_FEE, MER_SETTLE_AMT, TRAN_FEE, TRAN_SETTLE_AMT, REFNO, PRDNO ) VALUES ( #{recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subBus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cooporgNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merRateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merRateTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranRateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranRateTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdTranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdTranTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merSettleAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranSettleAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prdno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
